title: FS: Good Condition Raw Piedmont 150 Fred Clarke Portrait
author: btcarfagno

posts.post_title: FS: Good Condition Raw Piedmont 150 Fred Clarke Portrait
posts.post_content:
Nice little find from antique store excursion recently. Some light creasing moves this from VG to Good.

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/2016/4cb1b78f-9743-40d8-8df1-39285b30bf84_zpscd7divuo.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/2016/d93676f8-4789-4879-84e5-1e233a727545_zpsvjgx4txs.jpg[/IMG]

Asking $70 delivered.

Tom C
